fulltext:
CANDIDATE REPORT 
CANDIDATE INFORMATION 
Name  
: Hoang Truong 
D.O.B 
: 26/01/1990 
Status 
: Female/ Single/Vietnamese 
Notice Date 
: 1 week 
EDUCATION & QUALIFICATIONS 
09/2008 - 04/2013 
Ton Duc Thang University – BA in Information and Technology 
06/2013 – 12/2013 
Integrated Marketing Communication (IMC) 
WORKING EXPERIENCES 
May 2018 – June 2019  
Position: : Integrated Account Manager 
Company: Cheil Vietnam 
- 
Operate and execute both ATL and Digital campaign for Samsung Marcom and Ecom included 
CE (Consumer Electric) and IM (IT & Mobile).. 
- 
Interface with executive management in caring for the overall health of assigned clients.. 
- 
Assess client needs quickly and team challenges proactively to create and enable effective 
solutions quickly. 
Apr 2017 – Mar 2018  
Position: : Crisis Account Manager 
Company: YouNet Digital 
- 
Operate business unit with structure and process to run new service requested from 
client.Interface with executive management in caring for the overall health of assigned clients. 
- 
Manage the internal process with teams. Work with, inspire, and be inspired by internal team. 
- 
Optimizing profit from client and achieved KPI 10 bil. VND in 2017. 
Apr 2016 – Jan 2017  
Position: : Communication Design Supervisor 
Company: Dentsu Vietnam 
- 
Be a primary, day-to-day contact for all matters of strategy and planning, including research, 
briefs, creative collaboration. 
- 
Take a leadership role in discovering and articulating differentiating customer’s insights, touch 
points behavior and translating them into strategic and creative platforms. 
- 
Strategy development initiatives for clients and new business. 
- 
Partner with Researching, Media agency and Ad network publisher to ensure the feeding and 
gathering latest new information for channel, brand touch-point. 
Apr 2014 – Apr 2016 
Position: : Account Manager 
Company: Mirum Vietnam 
- 
Consulting, managing and growing Client relationship as a digital expert. 
- 
Champion a team of Planner, Social media, Designers, Developers, Interns and Peers. 
- 
Managing resource allocation and revenue forecasting to develop career plans and handle reviews 
for staff. 
- 
Build up relationship with Ad network publisher, production house and other 3rd innovative 
production partners. 
Aug 2012 – Mar 2014 
Position: : Account Executive 
Company: April+ 
- 
Project management. 
- 
Find/build up/ take good care/maintain customer loyalty of new/traditional clients. 
- 
Organize brainstorming session to collect ideas, analyze reasoning ideas based on the market 
insights for final Campaign Proposal. 
*****

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin

experiences.detail:
- Operate and execute both ATL and Digital campaign for Samsung Marcom and Ecom included
CE (Consumer Electric) and IM (IT & Mobile).. - Interface with executive management in caring for the overall health of assigned clients..
- Assess client needs quickly and team challenges proactively to create and enable effective solutions quickly.

- Operate business unit with structure and process to run new service requested from
client.Interface with executive management in caring for the overall health of assigned clients.
- Manage the internal process with teams. Work with, inspire, and be inspired by internal team.
- Optimizing profit from client and achieved KPI 10 bil. VND in 2017.

- Be a primary, day-to-day contact for all matters of strategy and planning, including research, briefs, creative collaboration.
- Take a leadership role in discovering and articulating differentiating customer’s insights, touch points behavior and translating them into strategic and creative platforms.
- Strategy development initiatives for clients and new business.
- Partner with Researching, Media agency and Ad network publisher to ensure the feeding and gathering latest new information for channel, brand touch-point.

- Consulting, managing and growing Client relationship as a digital expert.
- Champion a team of Planner, Social media, Designers, Developers, Interns and Peers. - Managing resource allocation and revenue forecasting to develop career plans and handle reviews for staff.
- Build up relationship with Ad network publisher, production house and other 3rd innovative production partners.

- Project management.
- Find/build up/ take good care/maintain customer loyalty of new/traditional clients.
- Organize brainstorming session to collect ideas, analyze reasoning ideas based on the market insights for final Campaign Proposal.
